resources.string: Press one of the buttons below to send a user feedback or an idea for a new feature. I will use it to improve the app.
There are no expenses for this month.

I just want to give credit to some amazing people who created the font and API that allow me to make this app come to fruition. 

P.S. I am required to do this anyways so here goes.


1. Quicksand by Andrew Paglinawan
